name: Intro
_source: s;Lupus;Fine! Anyway, here's my plan.{w}{br}You two will enter as the esteemed guests you are.
s;Lupus;Don't worry about the guard.{w}{br}He'll ask for your names, but that's just to announce you.
s;Lupus;After that, I just need you to blend in. Mill around, act normal.{w}{br}Meanwhile, keep an eye out for the pass words for...
s;Lupus;His magically sealed vault.{w}{br}Once we have that, the fun begins.
s;Simon;Should we be worried about security?
s;Lupus;If they start asking questions, act clueless.{w}{br}They're not about to throw guests out of a party.
s;Simon;Understood. We will meet you once we have the pass words.
s;Lupus;Great. Remember, you're looking for two.{w}{br}See you love birds soon.
s;Anuki;Think he'll make it five minutes without being caught?
s;Simon;I suppose we'll have to see.
